About the Company: Hind Aluminium Inds.Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of aluminium and power generation. The company`s brand Decogrille is the most widely used aluminium security grill throughout the country. They have also succeeded in exporting this product to neighbouring countries.Theproduct range of the company includes Alloy Ingots,EC Wire Rods,Flipped Wire Rod,Aluminium Grills,Aluminium Floorings,Aluminium Frames,Surface Coatings,Structural Glazings & Curtain Wall Systems..The company also in the business segment of Power, Aluminium Product.
